faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about StructureClerk
faq.question1: Are my documents secure with StructureClerk?
faq.answer1: Yes, absolutely. We use end-to-end encryption (AES-256) to protect your documents. Your data is automatically backed up on secure servers with geographic redundancy. We are GDPR and HIPAA compliant, and we never share your data with third parties without your explicit consent.
faq.question2: Is StructureClerk really simple to use?
faq.answer2: Yes, that's our #1 promise. StructureClerk is designed specifically for construction entrepreneurs, not software experts. Our interface has only 4 main menus, and most users are operational in less than 5 minutes. No lengthy training, no complex manuals to read.
faq.question3: How does StructureClerk compare to other solutions?
faq.answer3: Unlike generic solutions that require 12+ modules and 40+ clicks to approve an invoice, StructureClerk lets you do the same thing in 2 clicks: drag + approve. Our AI is specialized for construction documents and recognizes technical terms specific to your industry. On average, our users save 4+ hours per week.
faq.question4: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
faq.answer4: Yes, with absolutely no commitment. You can cancel your subscription at any time from your dashboard, and access will end at the end of your current billing period. No cancellation fees, no questions asked. We also offer a 30-day money-back guarantee: if you're not completely satisfied, we'll refund you 100%.
faq.noQuestion: Can't find an answer to your question?
faq.noQuestionDescription: Our team of experts is here to help. Contact us and we'll respond within 24 hours.
